my_chaotic_tranquility: I’m 44 and have been processing 24 of ‘childhood’ trauma for 2 decades as well. I used to think there would be a time when I didn’t have to, but I long ago accepted that it is as much a part of me as the tiny freckles sprinkled across my nose. I never knew innocence, but I try to gift it to myself each time I process. Now instead of processing through my eyes that saw too much too soon, I process through the protected eyes of my children. Life can be magical. Love & Light to you✨❤️✨
